abstract_summ: 30 patients infected with novel coronavirus pneumonia referred to jianghan university hospital between January 11, 2020 and January 3, 2020 were studied . The patients consisted of 10 men and 20 women, including 22 doctors and 8 nurses, aged 21~59 years . Severe patients had BMI increased, heating time prolonged, white blood cell count, lymphocyte count, liver enzyme, LDH, myoenzyme and D-dimer significantly increased in severe patients .
